### Mortality

#### Cumulative Reported Fatalities

The graph below is the tally of fatalities since starting from 10<sup>th</sup> confirmed death. The y-axis is log scaled.

```{r}
fig <- readRDS("../figures/deaths_acc.RDS")
fig
```

<br>
<br>

#### Cummulative Fatalities (per million)

Fatalities adjusted by the country population.

```{r}
fig <- readRDS("../figures/mort_pm.RDS")
fig
```

<br>
<br>

#### Case Fatality Rate (CFR)

The observed fatalities divided by the total number of confirmed cases results in the case fatality rate (CFR).

```{r}
fig <- readRDS("../figures/cfr.RDS")
fig
```

<br>
<br>

### Sources
